SEARCH
Package domain

Class MachineController

java.lang.Object
domain.MachineController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Subject
public class MachineController extends Object implements Subject
Controller class for managing machine operations. Implements the Subject interface for observer pattern functionality. Handles CRUD operations for machines and converts between DTOs and domain objects.

  • Constructor Details

    • MachineController

      public MachineController()
      Constructs a new MachineController and initializes dependencies. Automatically adds a NotificationObserver to observe changes.

    • createMachine

      public MachineDTO createMachine(SiteDTOWithoutMachines siteDTO, UserDTO technicianDTO, String code, MachineStatus machineStatus, ProductionStatus productionStatus, String location, String productInfo, LocalDate futureMaintenance) throws InformationRequiredExceptionMachine
      Creates and adds a new machine with full details.
      Parameters:
      siteDTO - the site where the machine is located
      technicianDTO - the technician responsible for the machine
      code - the machine code/identifier
      machineStatus - the operational status of the machine
      productionStatus - the production status of the machine
      location - the physical location of the machine
      productInfo - information about products the machine handles
      futureMaintenance - scheduled maintenance date
      Returns:
      the created machine as DTO
      Throws:
      InformationRequiredExceptionMachine - if required fields are missing

    • updateMachine

      public MachineDTO updateMachine(int id, SiteDTOWithoutMachines siteDTO, UserDTO technicianDTO, String code, MachineStatus machineStatus, ProductionStatus productionStatus, String location, String productInfo, LocalDate futureMaintenance) throws InformationRequiredExceptionMachine
      Updates an existing machine with new details.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the machine to update
      siteDTO - the new site information
      technicianDTO - the new technician information
      code - the new machine code
      machineStatus - the new machine status
      productionStatus - the new production status
      location - the new location
      productInfo - the new product information
      futureMaintenance - the new maintenance date
      Returns:
      the updated machine as DTO
      Throws:
      InformationRequiredExceptionMachine - if required fields are missing
